name: Akrysolv® 2061 XS-50
description: Akrysolv® 2061 XS-50 is used for 2 K PUR products for Wood Protection and Metal Protection. It is dedicated to the production of two-component polyurethane products and one-component acrylic enamels and paints. Compared to conventional alkyds, they feature better resistance and decorative properties. Their production is based on an optimized recipe, which allows us to obtain products with a high-performance quality, perfectly adapted to the needs and expectations.
